item.title: 交易强劲，Coinbase 第三季度实现盈利
item.description: Coinbase Global 周三公布了第三季度利润，这主要得益于该交易所强劲的交易量，因为在一连串监管许可之后，加密货币日益成为主流投资行业的一部分。【原文：Coinbase Global posted a third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by strong trading volumes at the exchange as cryptocurrency increasingly becomes a part of the mainstream investment industry following a string of regulatory clearances.】

item.title: 广告销售额增加，Roku 季度收入超出预期
item.description: Roku 周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其平台广告销售额的增长。【原文：Roku on Wednesday beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue, driven by higher advertising sales on its platform.】

item.title: EBay 预测季度收入低于预期
item.description: 电子商务公司 eBay 周三预测第四季度营收低于华尔街预期，表明其主要类别（如收藏品和翻新商品）的产品需求疲软，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 11%。【原文：Ecommerce firm eBay forecast fourth-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling weak demand for products in its key categories like collector's items and refurbished goods, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: Robinhood 公布季度利润，零售交易强劲
item.description: 受强劲的股票和加密货币交易量推动，经纪公司 Robinhood 周三公布了第三季度利润报告。【原文：Brokerage Robinhood reported a third-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by robust equities and crypto trading volumes.】

item.title: Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 预计假日季度营收高于预期
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta Platforms 周三预测，本季度营收将高于市场预期，预计强劲的假期广告支出将继续支付其大规模人工智能投资的成本。【原文：Facebook-owner Meta Platforms forecast current-quarter revenue above market expectations on Wednesday, projecting robust holiday ad spending that should continue to cover the cost of its massive artificial intelligence investments.】

item.title: DoorDash 预测第四季度业绩强劲，押注在线外卖需求
item.description: 本周三，DoorDash 预测第四季度核心利润将高于预期，这家在线外卖公司押注于更多消费者在节假日期间使用该平台订购食品杂货和美容产品。【原文：DoorDash forecast fourth-quarter core profit above estimates on Wednesday, as the online delivery firm bets on more consumers using the platform to order groceries to beauty products during the holiday period.】

item.title: 星巴克公布可比销售额和盈利下降，原因是全球需求受挫
item.description: 星巴克周三公布，第四季度全球可比销售额下降了 7%，原因是该咖啡连锁店正在努力恢复美国和中国主要市场对其价格昂贵的拿铁咖啡的需求。【原文：Starbucks on Wednesday reported a 7% drop in global comparable sales for the fourth quarter as the coffee chain struggles to revive demand for its pricey lattes in the key U.S. and China markets.】

item.title: 人工智能推动云业务增长，微软季度业绩超预期
item.description: 微软公司周三公布的第一季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，原因是数据中心容量建设工作和人工智能需求推动了其云业务的发展。【原文：Microsoft beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday as efforts to build data-center capacity and AI-driven demand boosted its cloud business.】

item.title: 安进公司第三季度利润增长，销售额增长 24
item.description: 安进公司周三公布的季度财报显示，受胆固醇药物Repatha和治疗骨质疏松症的Prolia等产品销售额增长24%的推动，该公司的季度盈利有所增长，并表示将在今年年底公布一项潜在利润丰厚的肥胖症药物的中期试验结果。【原文：Amgen reported higher quarterly earnings on Wednesday, driven by a 24% rise in sales of products including cholesterol drug Repatha and Prolia for osteoporosis, and said results of a mid-stage trial of a potentially lucrative obesity medicine will be unveiled late this year.】

item.title: 美国疾控中心称与麦当劳大肠杆菌疫情有关的感染病例增至 90 例
item.description: 美国疾病控制和预防中心周三表示，与麦当劳Quarter Pounder汉堡包有关的大肠杆菌疫情的感染人数已从75人增至90人。【原文：The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Wednesday that the number of infected people from the E.coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburgers has increased to 90 from 75.】

item.title: 雅培、利洁时米德早产儿配方奶粉案要求陪审团赔偿 60 多亿美元
item.description: 密苏里州一位母亲的律师周三要求陪审团在最近一次庭审中要求雅培公司和利洁时公司旗下的美赞臣公司支付总计超过 60 亿美元的赔偿金，因为这两家公司生产的早产儿配方奶粉导致了严重的肠道疾病。【原文：A lawyer for a Missouri mother on Wednesday asked a jury to make Abbott and Reckitt's Mead Johnson pay a total of more than $6 billion in the latest trial over claims that the companies' formulas for premature babies caused a severe intestinal illness.】

item.title: 特朗普希望将现在与四年前相比。看起来是这样的
item.description: 共和党总统候选人、前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在竞选结束时向在他和民主党人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）之间做出选择的选民们提出的论点集中在美国政治的一个老问题上：询问选民他们现在是否比四年前过得更好。【原文：Republican presidential candidate and former President Donald Trump's end-of-campaign arguments to voters choosing between him and Democrat Kamala Harris have focused on an old standby in U.S. politics: Asking voters whether they are better off now than they were four years ago.】

item.title: 百事公司高管表示，百事公司与零售商共享采购数据以改进销售预测
item.description: 百事公司的一位高管本周在接受采访时说，随着购物者寻找更便宜的选择，百事公司正在对其一些顶级品牌（如 Lay's 薯片）进行全面改革，该公司正越来越多地与大型零售商共享数据，以换取购物者梦寐以求的购买信息。【原文：PepsiCo , which is overhauling some of its top brands like Lay's potato chips as shoppers look for cheaper options, is increasingly sharing data with major retailers and in return getting coveted information on shoppers' purchases, a PepsiCo executive said in an interview this week.】

item.title: 必和必拓为英国铜矿商 Anglo 提出新报价
item.description: 必和必拓表示，公司董事长在周三的年度股东大会上发表的言论并不意味着公司排除了在5月份竞购失败几个月后再次向英美资源集团提出收购要约的可能性。【原文：BHP said that comments made by its chairman at Wednesday's annual general meeting did not mean the company rules out a renewed offer for Anglo American , months after its failed bid in May.】

item.title: SkyBridge 的斯卡拉穆奇称美国将解决债务危机，比特币到 2026 年将增长两倍
item.description: 天桥资本（SkyBridge Capital）创始人安东尼-斯卡拉穆奇（Anthony Scaramucci）周三表示，美国将通过允许通胀率小幅上升来有效解决债务危机，尽管这可能会对储蓄者和中低收入家庭造成负面影响，他对11月5日美国大选前最两极分化的经济辩论之一持相反观点。【原文：The U.S. will effectively address its debt crisis by allowing inflation to rise slightly even though it may negatively impact savers and lower- to middle-income households, SkyBridge Capital founder Anthony Scaramucci said on Wednesday, taking a contrarian view to one of the most polarizing economic debates ahead of the Nov. 5 U.S. election.】

item.title: 亚马逊员工对 AWS 首席执行官重返办公室的言论表示 "震惊"，并敦促扭转政策
item.description: 亚马逊公司 500 多名员工周三致信其 AWS 部门首席执行官，敦促撤销全员返回办公室的政策，并拒绝接受他关于该规则得到广泛支持、反对者应离开亚马逊网络服务的说法。【原文：More than 500 Amazon.com employees sent a letter on Wednesday to the CEO of its AWS unit urging reversal of a full return-to-office policy and rejecting his assertion that the rule had broad support and opponents should leave Amazon Web Services.】

item.title: 机票大战结束，美国航空公司利润增加
item.description: 由于今年夏天困扰市场的运力急剧下降，美国的航空公司似乎重新找回了魔力。机票价格转而走高，航空股目前的表现也优于大盘。【原文：U.S. airlines appear to have rediscovered their mojo, thanks to a sharp reduction in capacity that plagued the market this summer. Airfares have turned higher, and airline stocks are now outperforming the broader market.】

item.title: 大众汽车要求减薪 10
item.description: 大众汽车公司周四在一份声明中表示，为了保持竞争力和保障工作岗位，该公司希望员工减薪 10%。【原文：Volkswagen wants its workforce to take pay cuts of 10% in order to remain competitive and safeguard jobs, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，欧盟委员会将对特穆展开调查
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，欧盟委员会将对中国在线零售平台特姆优（Temu）展开调查，调查其是否违反了旨在防止在线销售非法产品的规定。【原文：The European Commission is set to launch an investigation into Chinese online retail platform Temu over whether it is in breach of rules meant to prevent the sale of illegal products online, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 育碧预计第三季度净预订额下降 39
item.description: 法国视频游戏制作商育碧公司财务总监弗雷德里克-杜盖特（Frederick Duguet）周三告诉记者，由于育碧在第三季度没有新游戏发布，因此预计该公司第三季度的净预订额将同比下降约 39%，约为 3.8 亿欧元（约合 4.12 亿美元）。【原文：French video game producer Ubisoft expects net bookings for its third quarter to be down about 39% year on year at about 380 million euros ($412 million) because it has no new releases in the quarter, finance chief Frederick Duguet told reporters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众提议减薪 10%以应对危机
item.description: 大众汽车人事主管阿尔内-梅斯温克尔（Arne Meiswinkel）在与工会进行第二轮会谈后告诉记者，大众汽车已提议将其品牌的工资削减 10%，以应对需求疲软和成本高企的问题。【原文：Volkswagen has proposed to cut wages at its brand by 10% to tackle weak demand and high costs, the division's personnel chief Arne Meiswinkel told journalists after the second round of talks with unions.】

item.title: 空中客车公司第三季度利润增长，保持全年目标不变
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周三公布的第三季度核心利润和收入均高于预期，这主要得益于对盈利机型的需求以及陷入困境的太空业务的有利年度对比。【原文：Airbus maintained financial and industrial targets as it posted higher-than-expected third-quarter core profit and revenues on Wednesday, led by demand for profitable models and a favourable annual comparison for its troubled space business.】

item.title: 英国里夫斯豪赌税收与支出重振经济
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的首份预算案标志着一场巨大的赌博，即她能否利用筹集到的数百亿英镑税款迅速重建国家，并承受住负责提供资金的企业的愤怒。【原文：British finance minister Rachel Reeves' first budget marks a huge gamble that she can quickly rebuild the country with the tens of billions of pounds she has raised in taxes, and withstand the anger of businesses charged with funding it.】

item.title: 日产或与雷诺合作为欧洲开发新型小型电动车
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺正在与日产谈判，以帮助这家日本公司向市场推出雷诺电动车 Twingo 的自己的版本。【原文：French automaker Renault is in talks with Nissan to help the Japanese firm bring to market its own version of Renault's electric Twingo, as the alliance partners seek to speed up an affordable EV offering to fend off Chinese competition.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率飙升至 6.73%，为 7 月以来最高
item.description: 上周，美国最受欢迎的住房贷款利率跃升至 6.73%，创下自 7 月份以来的新高，即使美联储有望进一步下调其短期借贷成本目标，这仍给房地产市场增添了不利因素。【原文：The interest rate for the most popular U.S. home loan jumped last week to 6.73%, its highest since July, adding to headwinds for the housing market even as the Federal Reserve looks set to further lower its target for short-term borrowing costs.】

item.title: Alphabet 称 Spotify 和派拉蒙签约使用新的云芯片
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌云公司（Google Cloud）周三表示，Spotify Technology 和 Paramount Global 正在使用该公司利用 Arm Holdings 的技术设计的新芯片，为其流媒体服务提供动力。【原文：Google Cloud, a unit of Alphabet Inc , said on Wednesday that Spotify Technology and Paramount Global are using a new chip that it designed with technology from Arm Holdings to power their streaming services.】

item.title: 苹果推出功能更强大的新版 MacBook Pro
item.description: 苹果公司推出了新版本的 MacBook Pro，以满足专业用户对更强大的照片、视频和音频编辑工具芯片的需求，从而提高该系列笔记本电脑的销量。【原文：Apple launched new versions of the MacBook Pro as it looks to drum up sales of the line of laptops leaning in to demand from professional users who seek more powerful chips for photo, video and audio editing tools.】

item.title: 消息人士称，意大利准备在市场上出售 Monte dei Paschi 股份，长期计划难以实现
item.description: 两位接近出售进程的消息人士称，意大利正在努力争取在年底截止日期前为其持有的锡耶纳银行股份找到一个 "战略 "买家，因此除了转向市场和扩大分散的股东基础外，意大利别无选择。【原文：Italy is struggling to find a "strategic" buyer for its stake in lender Monte dei Paschi di Siena before a year-end deadline, leaving it with little alternative but to turn to the market and broaden a fragmented shareholder base, two sources close to the sale process said.】

item.title: 美国财政部将拍卖规模维持到 2025 年 1 月，并宣布退款 1 250 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，预计 "至少在未来几个季度内 "不会增加美国票据和债券的拍卖规模，这与预期一致，因为财政部宣布从2024年11月至2025年1月每季度退还1250亿美元。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it does not anticipate increasing auction sizes for U.S. notes and bonds for "at least the next several quarters," in line with expectations, as it announced quarterly refunding of $125 billion from November 2024 to January 2025.】

item.title: NAR 称美国成屋待完成销售创四年多来最大增幅
item.description: 在更有吸引力的利率和待售房产库存改善的双重作用下，9 月份美国旧房购买合同的增幅为四年多来最大。【原文：Contracts to buy U.S. previously owned homes jumped by the most in more than four years in September on a mix of more attractive interest rates and improving inventory of properties for sale.】
